00099 template <typename IndexType, typename ValueType, class MemorySpace>
00100 class ell_matrix : public detail::matrix_base<IndexType,ValueType,MemorySpace,cusp::ell_format>
00101 {
00102   typedef cusp::detail::matrix_base<IndexType,ValueType,MemorySpace,cusp::ell_format> Parent;
00103   public:
00106     template<typename MemorySpace2>
00107     struct rebind { typedef cusp::ell_matrix<IndexType, ValueType, MemorySpace2> type; };
00108     
00111     typedef typename cusp::array2d<IndexType, MemorySpace, cusp::column_major> column_indices_array_type;
00112     
00115     typedef typename cusp::array2d<ValueType, MemorySpace, cusp::column_major> values_array_type;
00116     
00119     typedef typename cusp::ell_matrix<IndexType, ValueType, MemorySpace> container;
00120 
00123     typedef typename cusp::ell_matrix_view<typename column_indices_array_type::view,
00124                                            typename values_array_type::view,
00125                                            IndexType, ValueType, MemorySpace> view;
00126     
00129     typedef typename cusp::ell_matrix_view<typename column_indices_array_type::const_view,
00130                                            typename values_array_type::const_view,
00131                                            IndexType, ValueType, MemorySpace> const_view;
00132 
00133 
00136     const static IndexType invalid_index = static_cast<IndexType>(-1);
00137     
00140     column_indices_array_type column_indices;
00141 
00144     values_array_type values;
00145 
00148     ell_matrix() {}
00149 
00159     ell_matrix(size_t num_rows, size_t num_cols, size_t num_entries,
00160                size_t num_entries_per_row, size_t alignment = 32)
00161       : Parent(num_rows, num_cols, num_entries)
00162     {
00163       // TODO use array2d constructor when it can accept pitch
00164       column_indices.resize(num_rows, num_entries_per_row, detail::round_up(num_rows, alignment));
00165       values.resize        (num_rows, num_entries_per_row, detail::round_up(num_rows, alignment));
00166     }
00167 
00172     template <typename MatrixType>
00173     ell_matrix(const MatrixType& matrix);
00174     
00177     void resize(size_t num_rows, size_t num_cols, size_t num_entries,
00178                 size_t num_entries_per_row)
00179     {
00180       Parent::resize(num_rows, num_cols, num_entries);
00181       column_indices.resize(num_rows, num_entries_per_row);
00182       values.resize(num_rows, num_entries_per_row);
00183     }
00184                
00187     void resize(size_t num_rows, size_t num_cols, size_t num_entries,
00188                 size_t num_entries_per_row, size_t alignment)
00189     {
00190       Parent::resize(num_rows, num_cols, num_entries);
00191       column_indices.resize(num_rows, num_entries_per_row, detail::round_up(num_rows, alignment));
00192       values.resize        (num_rows, num_entries_per_row, detail::round_up(num_rows, alignment));
00193     }
00194     
00199     void swap(ell_matrix& matrix)
00200     {
00201       Parent::swap(matrix);
00202       column_indices.swap(matrix.column_indices);
00203       values.swap(matrix.values);
00204     }
00205     
00210     template <typename MatrixType>
00211     ell_matrix& operator=(const MatrixType& matrix);
00212 }; // class ell_matrix
00231 template <typename Array1,
00232           typename Array2,
00233           typename IndexType   = typename Array1::value_type,
00234           typename ValueType   = typename Array2::value_type,
00235           typename MemorySpace = typename cusp::minimum_space<typename Array1::memory_space, typename Array2::memory_space>::type >
00236 class ell_matrix_view : public detail::matrix_base<IndexType,ValueType,MemorySpace,cusp::ell_format>
00237 {
00238   typedef cusp::detail::matrix_base<IndexType,ValueType,MemorySpace,cusp::ell_format> Parent;
00239   public:
00242     typedef Array1 column_indices_array_type;
00243     
00246     typedef Array2 values_array_type;
00247     
00250     typedef typename cusp::ell_matrix<IndexType, ValueType, MemorySpace> container;
00251 
00254     typedef typename cusp::ell_matrix_view<Array1, Array2, IndexType, ValueType, MemorySpace> view;
00255 
00258     const static IndexType invalid_index = static_cast<IndexType>(-1);
00259     
00262     column_indices_array_type column_indices;
00263 
00266     values_array_type values;
00267 
00270     ell_matrix_view() {}
00271 
00272     template <typename OtherArray1, typename OtherArray2>
00273     ell_matrix_view(size_t num_rows, size_t num_cols, size_t num_entries,
00274                     OtherArray1& column_indices, OtherArray2& values)
00275     : Parent(num_rows, num_cols, num_entries), column_indices(column_indices), values(values) {}
00276 
00277     template <typename OtherArray1, typename OtherArray2>
00278     ell_matrix_view(size_t num_rows, size_t num_cols, size_t num_entries,
00279                     const OtherArray1& column_indices, const OtherArray2& values)
00280     : Parent(num_rows, num_cols, num_entries), column_indices(column_indices), values(values) {}
00281     
00282     template <typename Matrix>
00283     ell_matrix_view(Matrix& A)
00284     : Parent(A), column_indices(A.column_indices), values(A.values) {}
00285     
00286     template <typename Matrix>
00287     ell_matrix_view(const Matrix& A)
00288     : Parent(A), column_indices(A.column_indices), values(A.values) {}
00289     
00292     void resize(size_t num_rows, size_t num_cols, size_t num_entries,
00293                 size_t num_entries_per_row)
00294     {
00295       Parent::resize(num_rows, num_cols, num_entries);
00296       column_indices.resize(num_rows, num_entries_per_row);
00297       values.resize(num_rows, num_entries_per_row);
00298     }
00299                
00302     void resize(size_t num_rows, size_t num_cols, size_t num_entries,
00303                 size_t num_entries_per_row, size_t alignment)
00304     {
00305       Parent::resize(num_rows, num_cols, num_entries);
00306       column_indices.resize(num_rows, num_entries_per_row, detail::round_up(num_rows, alignment));
00307       values.resize        (num_rows, num_entries_per_row, detail::round_up(num_rows, alignment));
00308     }
00309 }; // class ell_matrix_view
